
{{alias}}( fcn, ...args )
    Returns a function of smaller arity by partially applying arguments.

    Notes:

    - The implementation does not set the `length` of the returned function.
      Accordingly, the returned function `length` is always `0`.
    - The evaluation context is always `null`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    fcn: Function
        Function to partially apply.

    args: ...any
        Arguments to partially apply.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Function
        Partially applied function.

    Examples
    --------
    > function add( x, y ) {
    >     return x + y;
    > }
    > var add2 = {{alias}}( add, 2 );
    > var sum = add2( 3 )
    5

    See Also
    --------
